00044 class RAS_Rect
00045 {
00046 public:  // todo: make a decent class, and make private
00047     int m_x1, m_y1;
00048     int m_x2, m_y2;
00049 
00050 public:
00051     RAS_Rect() : m_x1(0), m_y1(0), m_x2(0), m_y2(0) {}
00052     int GetWidth(
00053     ) const {
00054         return m_x2 - m_x1;
00055     }
00056     int GetHeight(
00057     ) const {
00058         return m_y2 - m_y1;
00059     }
00060     int GetLeft(
00061     ) const {
00062         return m_x1;
00063     }
00064     int GetRight(
00065     ) const {
00066         return m_x2;
00067     }
00068     int GetBottom(
00069     ) const {
00070         return m_y1;
00071     }
00072     int GetTop(
00073     ) const {
00074         return m_y2;
00075     }
00076 
00077     void SetLeft(
00078         int x1)
00079     {
00080         m_x1 = x1;
00081     }
00082     void SetBottom(
00083         int y1)
00084     {
00085         m_y1 = y1;
00086     }
00087     void SetRight(
00088         int x2)
00089     {
00090         m_x2 = x2;
00091     }
00092     void SetTop(
00093         int y2)
00094     {
00095         m_y2 = y2;
00096     }
00097     
00098 #ifdef WITH_CXX_GUARDEDALLOC
00099 public:
00100     void *operator new(size_t num_bytes) { return MEM_mallocN(num_bytes, "GE:RAS_Rect"); }
00101     void operator delete( void *mem ) { MEM_freeN(mem); }
00102 #endif
00103 };
